title: Environmental Technology 8-Ounce Kit Casting' Craft Casting Epoxy, Clear
features: Complete Instructions and project ideas enclosed
Ideal for small casts (6 ounces or less)
Measure equal amounts of resin and hardener then mix.
Add colorants, granite powders or found objects, pour into mold and allow to cure.
Cast you own decorative knobs, and pulls, jewelry pieces, pendants, charms and buttons, coasters, paperweights, figurines and more.
description: GEARED FOR SMALL CASTS Have you found yourself binge-watching resin art lately? Are you still intimidated to start? The EasyCast Clear Casting Epoxy from Environmental Technology is a must-have for beginners. Ideal for casting small items such as knobs, jewelry pieces, coasters, and more! Our formula is specifically designed for small castings requiring up to 3/8 inches in thickness. Measure equal amounts of our two-part resin and hardener in a 1:1 volume ratio, then mix it to achieve the ideal embedding results. No need to worry about the bubbles! EasyCast has been formulated to self-degas within a few minutes of pouring under most casting conditions. Yes, you can create stunning color combinations and effects with your resin art. The EasyCast clear casting epoxy can easily be combined with fillers, dyes, and pigments for exciting and vibrant colors. Achieve the translucent glass effect by combining this 2 part casting epoxy with our Castin’Craft transparent paints. For the more adventurous artists, you can even create faux marbles! Experimenting with the process will perfect different techniques such as translucent glass effect, faux metal, and casting embedments. This kit comes with an instruction manual that is easy to follow - so your epoxy project will turn out the way you envisioned it. SAFE FOR YOU AND THE ENVIRONMENT Environmental Technology is committed to providing products that don’t harm you and the environment. The EasyCast is FDA Compliant (FDA 21 CFR 175.300) when accurately measured, thoroughly mixed, and fully cured. It has no extremely hazardous substances and is proudly made in the USA. So worry no more and jump-start your DIY art project now! Use only the best epoxy and resin for your arts and crafts to differentiate your creations from the rest. Order the EasyCast clear casting epoxy today to achieve beautiful results!
